name: text-magnifier
description: Chrome extension that magnifies text on hover with smooth animation

scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.build: cp manifest.json content.css src/popup.html dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.postbuild: cd dist && zip -r text-magnifier.zip manifest.json content.js content.css popup.html popup.js icons/
scripts.copy: cp manifest.json content.css src/popup.html dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.dev: npm run compile && npm run copy && concurrently -n ts,static -c blue,green 'npm:watch:ts' 'npm:watch:static'
scripts.test: npm run build && playwright test --grep-invert '手動操作'
scripts.test:headed: npm run build && playwright test --headed --grep-invert '手動操作'
scripts.test:manual: npm run build && playwright test --headed --grep '手動操作'
